clarified.  In Ninh Hoa town,
Khanh Hoa province, there is a bridge called the
three-legged bridge because people riding motorbikes
across the bridge are forced to use one foot to maintain
balance. There have been many cases of people falling into the river
when passing over the bridge.  In recent years, this bridge
has been an eye bridge across the
red river and stream in Ninh sim commune, Duc My town,
Ninh Hoa town. The bridge was built by people themselves
to cross the river with an iron beam
only about 8 meters wide and long.  10 meters
without a railing, people are
forced to use one free leg when crossing the bridge along
with the two wheels of the motorbike. There have been many cases of
both people and vehicles falling into the river at
night, especially during the rainy season. The bridge surface is
slippery.  The bridge is the main travel route
for people from the western villages to
Ninh S commune, so there are a lot of people passing by.
Currently, the people here are looking forward to having
a concrete bridge to ensure
safe travel.

2008 in the town on the outskirts of the

ancient material of straw to build houses under
a forest of concrete towers
to cope with climate change.
End of the year  In 2012, France had
regulations on using felt straw as a construction material
and this country currently has about 10,000
houses using felt straw to make insulated walls. The felt straw is
pressed into partitions reinforced with
bars that will be sprayed to increase durability.
clay to compact straw according to the
United Nations, material production activities such

used in construction are sources of
large CO2 emissions, dead fiberglass insulation
also creates  There are many emissions
during the production process and transporting
them to the place of use. However, using
properly processed straw as
insulation still ensures
fire prevention safety because the straw no longer
contains pure oxygen.  The
area has five public buildings,
three schools and two recreation centers
built with straw materials to both
reduce greenhouse gas emissions
and meet C requirements for surface development.

women's Challenge solo round-the-world sailing event The

event included 16 sailing boats. Brower
was the only female athlete at the event

When the autopilot crashed

event was to let more people have  You can

path of a professional sailor.
